meanings.definition: A group of people working together to achieve a common goal.
meanings.sent1: The two teams played soccer together.
meanings.sent2: The teams worked hard to finish the project on time.
meanings.sent3: The teams decided to have a pizza party to celebrate their success.
meanings.sent4: In the business world, teams are like puzzle pieces that fit together perfectly.
meanings.sent5: The teams' unity was as strong as a steel chain, unbreakable and reliable.

meanings.definition: To come together as a team to compete in a sport or activity.
meanings.sent1: Let's teams up to win the game!
meanings.sent2: They teams every year for the annual relay race.
meanings.sent3: The friends teams to see who could eat the most hot dogs.
meanings.sent4: The dancers teams gracefully across the stage, moving as one.
meanings.sent5: As the music played, the synchronized swimmers teams in perfect harmony.
